title: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court
author: Twain, Mark
excerpt: This audio reading of A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court is read by
content:
This audio reading of A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court is read by

Steve Andersen
